data.name: Tech Cruise
data.description: Tech Cruise 2020 takes place May 23rd to 28th, 2020 onboard the Royal Caribbean ‘Grandeur of the Seas’ Cruise Ship departing Orlando (Port Canaveral), Florida, sailing to CocoCay (Bahamas), King’s Wharf (Bermuda), then back. relatedRecords.name: Girls In Tech Summit
relatedRecords.description: The Girls in Tech Summit is a celebration of TechGirlz’s 10th Anniversary with talks on technology given by girls, for girls.
